news.title: Ubermenu update
news.body: This update adds customizable keybinds (Menu keys, Gamma and more) and GOTY server admin commands to the Ubermenu preset.

news.title: Update v1.0.4
news.body: This update provides adds a GOTY Mode checkbox to the settings, controlling features designed for use on 'Game of the Year' custom servers.

news.title: Update v1.0.3
news.body: This update provides better error messages on injection failure. Injection should now also perform better when multiple T:A processes are running.

news.title: TAMods v0.701
news.body: TAMods hotfix v0.701 is now available. This fix resolves issues injecting TAMods when running Windows 7 or earlier.

news.title: Update v1.0.2
news.body: This TribesLauncher update brings improvements to the login server system preventing issues after T:A server maintenance, as well as custom login server support when launching via steam.

news.title: TAMods v0.7
news.body: TAMods v0.7 is now available, featuring weapon model switching, stats recording and more! See [here](https://www.tamods.org/blog/2018/07/15/tamods-0.7.html) for more info.

news.title: Update v1.0.1
news.body: This version brings minor bugfixes, and buttons in the Configure T:A dialog for access to your Tribes configuration directory, and the TAMods install directory.

news.title: TribesLauncher v1.0.0 release
news.body: Welcome to the new TribesLauncher! This version is the first stable release; if you encounter issues or have feedback, see the contact information in the Info dialogue.
